mean_cn: n. 敲诈，勒索，保护费；  vt. 向…敲诈
mean_en: the crime of threatening to tell secret information about someone unless the person being threatened gives you money or does what you want
sentence: The criminal blackmailed the girl by threatening to send out her photos.
sentence_trans: 罪犯威胁要泄露这个女生的艳照来敲诈她。
